Text: HiPST Hi Andy How are things I am still in Houston looking for a new home I hope that all is well with you Hopefully some certainty will happen with Newco in the near future I wanted some help from you in finding a job I know that you are very well respected in the industry so if any opportunity that may fit me comes your way could you please let me know Thank you for everything It was a pleasure working with you at Enron I have attached a copy of my resume to this email Thanks again and hope to hear from you soon Dayem Do You Yahoo Send FREE video emails in Yahoo Mail videomail DayemKhandkerdoc

HiPST Hi Hunter I tried sending you an email earlier but I didnt have the right address How are things I am still looking for a job I have attached a copy of my resume to this email If anything comes your way could you please let me know I am not necessarily fixated on trading It would be optimal but I will do anything else for now Thank you for everything Dayem Do You Yahoo Send FREE video emails in Yahoo Mail videomail DayemKhandkerdoc
